item.title: Hero Section
item.dc:creator: Richard Bland
item.content:encoded:
Awaken to a new world feeling

The AWAKEN app is designed to lock you out or shut your phone down for a specific time which suits you. For example, we believe in a good nights sleep and with this app your phone will automatically lock you out at the desired time, forcing you to put it down!

Download iPhone Download Android

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: Richard Bland
item.content:encoded:
It's simple and life changing

In a world consumed by mobile devices sometimes all you need to feel better is a little time off from the technology around us. Our app aims to changes the way you use your mobile device. From scheduling lockout times to switching off at bedtime, simple features will change your behaviours and habits.

Set your lockout time

I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorpe.

Schedule game times

I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorpe.

Get a good nights sleep

I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorpe.

Sync with family devices

I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorpe. Million Downloads Average Hours Sleeping Year of the AI Billion Cups of Coffee

Screenshots

A selection of screenshots of the app can be seen below.

What you are saying

We love hearing from our users. Here is a selection of reviews just in! This app has literally saved my marriage! We both have the app on our phones and come bedtime they shut off and we now have to talk to eachother... Denzel Dashford Creative Mind I really struggled with sleeping, I was always on my phone in bed and to be honest even though I wasn't doing anything the habit was hard to break. This app literally forced me to rethink my usage. Penny Pinstripe Magicians Assistant I use this app to schedule the game play for my little one. It helps us stick to a routine and gives me peace of mind that my lo isn't using technology all the time! Rachel Rivers Power Broker https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9uOETcuFjbE

Get Pro Features

You are more than welcome to download the app and use the free features, but we can't really survive without bombarding you with advertisements, so if you would like you could purchase one of the following pro packs.  

Fire Free

Just download the app today and fire it up. We are confident you will really love the free features...  

Pro Beat - £5.99

Want to get to grips with your breathing and sleep patterns? Purchase the pro beat package and gain access to this amazing sleep tracker too!  

Day and Night - £10.99

All the free features, plus the pro beat tracker, and now track exactly what and when your mobile devices throughout the home are being used. Great tool for keeping an eye on the kids.

Thank you kindly!

Location

123 Man Made Street, Planet Earth, Zip Code Google Directions

We Supporting you

We're here to offer support. Just drop us an email below.

Connect with us

Mon-Fri 9-5

+1-234-555-6789

Email 24/7

richard@bhambrabland.co.uk
